name: cc-plugins
description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced development workflows.

plugins.name: specs-dev
plugins.description: Spec-driven feature development workflow with Codex review. Combines iterative requirements gathering, comprehensive planning, and structured implementation with continuous AI-powered code review. Produces production-ready code with proper planning documentation and clean, incremental commits.

plugins.name: specs-dev-skill
plugins.description: Spec-first planning workflow that produces an approved plan.md before implementation, with reviewer subagent feedback and progress tracking. Use when a user asks for a plan-before-code process, a review-gated implementation plan, or a single plan.md that includes tasks and ongoing progress updates, with commits after each phase.

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: AI-powered code analysis skills leveraging multiple LLM backends. Includes codex-analyze for deep bug/security/performance analysis with prioritized findings, and gemini-analyze for large-scale codebase pattern detection and architectural overview.

plugins.name: python-script
plugins.description: Python script execution plugin for running Python code and scripts.
